name: mbin
tagline: A federated blogging and discussion platform using ActivityPub
description: Mbin is a federated blogging and discussion platform using ActivityPub. It allows multi-topic communities, rich posts, comments, moderation, and federation features similar to Mastodon or Lemmy.

features.title: Federated Platform
features.description: Connect with other ActivityPub instances to share content across the fediverse

features.title: Multi
features.description: Create and moderate topic-based communities for focused discussions

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Share text, links, images, and videos with formatting and embedded media

features.title: Comment Threads
features.description: Engage in nested comment discussions with voting and sorting options

features.title: Moderation Tools
features.description: Remove content, ban users, and manage community rules with comprehensive mod tools

features.title: User Profiles
features.description: Customize profiles with bio, avatar, and view posting history and statistics

features.title: Voting System
features.description: Upvote and downvote posts and comments to surface quality content

features.title: Subscription Management
features.description: Follow specific communities or users to curate your content feed
